field.name: summary
field.value: PerWebRequest LifeStyle raises error on Mono XSP

field.name: description
field.value: PerWebRequest LifeStyle for components raises same error as if you forget to add http modules and/or infrastructure dll in .NET. It claims you have not added needed lines to web.config even when you do that.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: Is that still a problem? We don't officially support Mono at the moment, but I'm happy to accept pull requests...

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: Since there's been no activity here for close to a year I'm going to assume it's a non issue anymore. If it still exists please open a new ticket for that
